attributes.action: Require the installation of gender-neutral toilets in new public buildings
attributes.additional_details: The recent move to require the installation of single-sex toilets, and the proposed changes to enforce single-sex spaces as such, has alienated many transgender and non-binary individuals. This change would ensure new regulations accommodate concerns from both sides of the debate. It is important that the support for gender-neutral facilities are not ignored for the sake of single-sex facilities.
attributes.background: We want universal lavatories to be included in new public buildings, similar to the new requirements for single-sex facilities, to be installed in new buildings over a certain size.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you might like to sign:
